description: Run workloads on Hugging Face Jobs infrastructure. Covers UV scripts, Docker jobs, hardware selection, authentication, secrets, timeouts, result persistence, scheduled jobs, and webhooks. For model training, see model-trainer skill.
key_concepts: Environment is ephemeral. Without persistence, ALL work is lost.
Running Workloads on Hugging Face Jobs
key_workflows: Use hf_jobs() MCP tool - Pass script content inline as string. Do NOT save to local files
Always handle auth - Hub operations require secrets: {"HF_TOKEN": "$HF_TOKEN"}
Provide job details after submission - Job ID, monitoring URL, estimated time
Set appropriate timeouts - Default 30min may be insufficient
Always persist results - Environment is ephemeral; all files deleted when job ends

reference_topics.topic: Saving Results to Hugging Face Hub
reference_topics.summary: **Job environments are ephemeral. ALL results lost when job ends unless persisted.** Job config must include: `"secrets": {"HF_TOKEN": "$HF_TOKEN"}` Script must verify: `assert "HF_TOKEN" in os.environ, "HF_TOKEN required!"`

**Required:** Pushing models/datasets, accessing private repos, creating repos, Hub API operations. **Not required:** Downloading public models/datasets, jobs without Hub interaction. **Recommended: Automatic token via secrets (encrypted server-side)**
| Symptom | Likely Cause | Fix | |---------|-------------|-----| | 401 Unauthorized | Token missing | `secrets: {"HF_TOKEN": "$HF_TOKEN"}` |
